name: A. Fibonacciness
input: InputThe first line contains an integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \leq t \leq 500$$$) — the number of test cases.The only line of each test case contains four integers $$$a_1, a_2, a_4, a_5$$$ ($$$1 \leq a_i \leq 100$$$).
output: OutputFor each test case, output the maximum Fibonacciness on a new line.
